attributes.additional_details: After The Disgraceful Behaviour Of David Haye & Derek Chisora, The Disgraceful Behaviour Of Newcsatle & Sunderland In Their Local Derby And Now The Disgusting Behaviour Of Bradford & Crawley. Is It Not Time That These So Called Role Models Should Face Criminal Prosecution And Not Be Allowed To Hide Behind Their Governing Bodies. If A Member Of The Public Behaved Like These They Would Be Prosecuted For Common Assault Or Even Afray. Therfore The Government Should Pass Legislation That All Such Incidents Should Face Compulsory Prosecution.
